SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
! : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Node name" ! : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PUP_NODE_NAME#" ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Node group name" ! : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PUP_NODE_GROUP#" ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Sign certificate" ! : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PUP_SIGN_CERT#" ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "AddNewNode"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " -issueid &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_GROUP# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " -comment &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: IF &UC4RB_PUP_SIGN_CERT# <> "" puppet cert sign &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_NAME# : ENDIF
: PRINT &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_PUP_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Set Execution Environment : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Invoking java binary : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" : CASE "UNIX" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** ADD NEW ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** ADD NEW ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
